sentences.english: In those days we did not need spies to watch the enemy's movement .
sentences.chinese: 在那些日子里，我们不需要情报员注意敌人动向。

sentences.english: Now the latest intelligence evaluations were being announced worldwide, nearly in real time.
sentences.chinese: 现在最新的情报分析实时地向全世界公布。

sentences.english: The intelligence service conceived a grand design to assassinate the War Minister.
sentences.chinese: 情报机构策划了一项暗杀陆军部长的重大计划。

sentences.english: This article verifies the basic concept of counter-intelligence activities.
sentences.chinese: 本文明确了当代反情报活动的基本概念。

sentences.english: He didn't get any money for this. He didn't go to a foreign government.
sentences.chinese: 他没有拿情报来卖钱，没有勾结外国政府。

sentences.english: The military intelligence prediction is a dynamic process of intelligence analysis and prediction.
sentences.chinese: 军事情报预测是一个动态的情报分析与预测过程。

sentences.english: The military intelligence prediction is a dynamic process of intelligence analysis and prediction.
sentences.chinese: 军事情报预测是一个动态的情报分析与预测过程。

sentences.english: The Chinese gather intelligence differently from Western nations, Wise writes.
sentences.chinese: 怀斯写道，中国收集情报的方法与西方国家不同。

sentences.english: They pried military information out of a prisoner.
sentences.chinese: 雷达情报网是一种专用的军事情报网。

sentences.english: They pried military information out of a prisoner.
sentences.chinese: 雷达情报网是一种专用的军事情报网。

sentences.english: Original, bai Yunchang is to infiltrate the army all information of especially high tax member.
sentences.chinese: 原来，白云裳是打入特高课的军统情报员。

sentences.english: The intelligence report is understood to have been issued to European navies.
sentences.chinese: 据悉，这份情报报告已经被分发到欧洲各国海军。

sentences.english: The intelligence information work is in the guiding position in the whole public security work.
sentences.chinese: 情报信息工作在整个公安工作中居于先导地位。

sentences.english: Americans have always had an ambivalent attitude toward  intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 美国人对情报工作有种爱恨交织态度。

sentences.english: My father used to work in counterintelligence.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲曾经在反情报机关工作。

sentences.english: Malone and others to get information, make sure Lin Wu Yang and others seeking was high.
sentences.chinese: 马龙等人获得情报，确定林午阳等人在寻找曾高。

definition: to pry into/to spy on/to probe into
to investigate a crime/to scout/to reconnoiter/reconnaissance/detection/a scout
